    • Method Detail

      • deploy

        @RequestMapping(value="/deployment",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<?> deploy(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           DeployApplicationRequest deployApplicationRequest)
        Trigger deployment of the application on the current configured PaaS.
        Parameters:
        deployApplicationRequest - application details for deployment (applicationId + deploymentProperties)
        Returns:
        An empty rest response.

      • undeploy

        @Deprecated
 @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/deployment",
                method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> undeploy(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String applicationEnvironmentId)
        Deprecated. 
        Trigger un-deployment of the application for a given environment on the current configured PaaS.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The id of the application to undeploy.
        applicationEnvironmentId - the id of the application environment to undeploy.
        Returns:
        An empty rest response.

      • undeploy

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/deployment",
                method=PUT,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void> undeploy(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             String applicationEnvironmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             alien4cloud.deployment.model.SecretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials secretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials)
        Trigger un-deployment of the application for a given environment on the current configured PaaS.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The id of the application to undeploy.
        applicationEnvironmentId - the id of the application environment to undeploy.
        secretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials - The secret provider configuration and credentials.
        Returns:
        An empty rest response.

      • getActiveDeployment

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/active-deployment",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.model.deployment.Deployment> getActiveDeployment(@PathVariable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String applicationEnvironmentId)
        Get only the active deployment for the given application on the given cloud
        Parameters:
        applicationId - id of the topology
        Returns:
        the active deployment

      • getRuntimeTopology

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+?}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId:.+?}/runtime-topology",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<alien4cloud.topology.TopologyDTO> getRuntimeTopology(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String applicationEnvironmentId)
        Get runtime topology of an application on a specific environment or the current deployment topology if no deployment is active. This method is necessary for example to compute output properties / attributes on the client side.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - application id for which to get the topology
        applicationEnvironmentId - application environment for which to get the topology
        Returns:
        RestResponse<TopologyDTO> containing the requested runtime Topology and the NodeType related to its NodeTemplates

      • getInstanceInformation

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/deployment/informations",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Map<String,Map<String,alien4cloud.paas.model.InstanceInformation>>>> getInstanceInformation(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    String applicationEnvironmentId)
        Get detailed information for every instances of every node of the application on the PaaS.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The id of the application to be deployed.
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains detailed informations (See InstanceInformation) of the application on the PaaS it is deployed.

      • scale

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/scale/{nodeTemplateId}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<Void>> scale(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     String applicationEnvironmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     String nodeTemplateId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     int instances,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     alien4cloud.deployment.model.SecretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials secretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials)
        Scale an application on a particular node.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The id of the application to be scaled.
        nodeTemplateId - The id of the node template to be scaled.
        instances - The instances number to be scaled up (if > 0)/ down (if < 0)
        Returns:
        A RestResponse that contains the application's current DeploymentStatus.

      • launchWorkflow

        @RequestMapping(value="/{applicationId:.+}/environments/{applicationEnvironmentId}/workflows/{workflowName}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
 @PreAuthorize(value="isAuthenticated()")
public org.springframework.web.context.request.async.DeferredResult<alien4cloud.rest.model.RestResponse<String>> launchWorkflow(@NotBlank @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String applicationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @NotBlank @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String applicationEnvironmentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @NotBlank @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  String workflowName,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  @RequestBody(required=false)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  alien4cloud.deployment.model.SecretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials secretProviderConfigurationAndCredentials)
